comments.author: @EricBourassa

comments.text: I don't understand the criticism of "this just looks like an episode of a TV show". When The Mandalorian was released, it was considered an achievement as a movie-level TV show in Star Wars. I don't understand how you can say this doesn't look cinematic enough for the big screen but then go and say the Ant-Man movies are great for Marvel because they are small heist movies. A movie's scale and budget should match the premise. This is not a Skywalker saga event film; this is a fun adventure film in the criminal underworld. It does not need a huge budget. It looks like a movie for theaters as much as any blockbuster.
comments.author: @quick4912
